targets.rawSql:
SELECT
ServiceName as id,
ServiceName as title,
AVG(Duration) / 1000 as mainstat, -- 예: 평균 지속 시간(ms)
CONCAT('req cnt ', CAST(count() AS VARCHAR)) as secondarystat,
--  AVG(Duration) / 1000 as detail__RESPONSE_TIME, -- 예: 평균 지속 시간(ms)
--  CAST(count() AS VARCHAR) as detail__REQUEST_COUNT,
CONCAT(CAST(sum((if(StatusCode = 'STATUS_CODE_ERROR', 1, 0)) * 100) / COUNT() AS VARCHAR) , '%') AS detail__ERROR_RATE,


sum(if(StatusCode == 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 1, 0)) / COUNT() AS arc__unset_rate,
sum(if(StatusCode == 'STATUS_CODE_OK', 1, 0)) / COUNT() AS arc__ok_rate,
sum(if(StatusCode == 'STATUS_CODE_ERROR', 1, 0)) / COUNT() AS arc__error_rate
-- StatusMessage as secondarystat
FROM otel_traces
WHERE ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb'
GROUP BY ServiceName

SELECT
concat(s.ServiceName, '_', t.ServiceName) as id,
 s.ServiceName as source,
 t.ServiceName as target,
 AVG(t.Duration) / 1000 as detail__RESPONSE_TIME,-- 예: 평균 응답 시간 (ms)
 CAST(count() AS VARCHAR) as detail__REQUEST_COUNT, -- 예: 전체 요청 수
 CONCAT(CAST(sum((if(t.StatusCode = 'ERROR', 1, 0)) * 100) * COUNT() AS VARCHAR) , '%') AS detail__ERROR_RATE
FROM otel_traces s
JOIN otel_traces t ON s.SpanId = t.ParentSpanId AND s.TraceId = t.TraceId
GROUP BY s.ServiceName, t.ServiceName

WITH TotalCount AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) as AllRows
    FROM otel_traces
)


SELECT
    ServiceName,
    CONCAT(CAST(ROUND(AVG(Duration) / 1000,2) AS VARCHAR), 'ms') as Response_Times, -- 예: 평균 지속 시간(ms)
    CONCAT(CAST(ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT AllRows FROM TotalCount)), 2) AS VARCHAR), '%') AS Request_Rates,
    CONCAT(CAST(ROUND((sum(if(StatusCode = 'STATUS_CODE_ERROR', 1, 0)) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 2) AS VARCHAR), '%') AS Error_Rates
FROM otel_traces
WHERE  ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}),  $trace_id) AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)  AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote})
GROUP BY ServiceName

-- WITH TotalCount AS (
--     SELECT COUNT(*) as AllRows
--     FROM otel_traces
    
-- )

-- SELECT  toStartOfMinute(`Timestamp`) as time, ServiceName, ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT AllRows FROM TotalCount)), 5) 
-- FROM otel_traces
--  WHERE $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}),  $trace_id) AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)  AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) 
--  GROUP BY ServiceName, time 
-- ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 100000

-- -- SELECT
-- --     toStartOfMinute(`Timestamp`) AS TimeBucket, -- 시간을 1분 단위로 버킷화
-- --     COUNT(*) AS RequestCount -- 해당 버킷에서의 요청 개수
-- -- FROM otel_traces
-- -- GROUP BY TimeBucket
-- -- ORDER BY TimeBucket


WITH RequestCounts AS (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(`Timestamp`) AS time,
    ServiceName,
    COUNT(*) AS RequestCount
  FROM otel_traces
  WHERE
    ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND
    $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}), $trace_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
    AND ServiceName IN (${serviceName:singlequote})
  GROUP BY ServiceName, time
),

TotalRequestCounts AS (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(`Timestamp`) AS time,
    COUNT(*) AS TotalRequestCount
  FROM otel_traces
  WHERE
    ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND
    $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}), $trace_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
  GROUP BY time
)

SELECT
  rc.time,
  rc.ServiceName,
  ROUND((rc.RequestCount * 100.0 / trc.TotalRequestCount), 5) AS RequestPercentage
FROM RequestCounts rc

JOIN TotalRequestCounts trc ON rc.time = trc.time
ORDER BY rc.time ASC, rc.ServiceName
LIMIT 100000

SELECT $__timeInterval(Timestamp) as time, ServiceName,
	AVG(Duration) as ` ` FROM otel_traces WHERE ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND  $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}),  $trace_id) AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND  ( Timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) AND ServiceName != 'loadgenerator' GROUP BY time, ServiceName ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 100000

SELECT $__timeInterval(Timestamp) as time, count(*) as ` `,
	ServiceName FROM otel_traces WHERE ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}),  $trace_id) AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) AND StatusCode= 'STATUS_CODE_ERROR' and ServiceName != 'loadgenerator' GROUP BY ServiceName, time ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 100000

SELECT
  toStartOfHour(TimeUnix) AS Time,
  concat(MetricName, ' (', ResourceAttributes['service.name'], ')') AS Metric,
  avg(Value) AS Avg_CPU_Usage
 FROM
  otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE
  MetricName LIKE '%cpu%' AND
  ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb'
GROUP BY
  Time,
  Metric
ORDER BY
  Time,
  Metric;

WITH TotalCount AS (
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(TimeUnix) as avg_time,
  AVG(Value) AS Avg_CPU_Usage,
  concat(MetricName, ' (', ResourceAttributes['service.name'], ')') AS Metric
FROM
  otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE
  MetricName LIKE '%cpu%'
GROUP BY
  avg_time, Metric
ORDER BY
  avg_time, Metric
  )


SELECT sum(Avg_CPU_Usage) as Total_CPU_USage, avg_time FROM TotalCount
Group By avg_time

SELECT
  toStartOfHour(TimeUnix) AS Time,
  concat(MetricName, ' (', ResourceAttributes['service.name'], ')') AS Metric,
  avg(Value) AS Avg_MEMORY_Usage
 FROM
  otel_metrics_sum
WHERE
  ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND
  MetricName LIKE '%memory%'
GROUP BY
  Time,
  Metric
ORDER BY
  Time,
  Metric;

WITH TotalCount AS (
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(TimeUnix) as avg_time,
  AVG(Value) AS Avg_MEMORY_Usage,
  concat(MetricName, ' (', ResourceAttributes['service.name'], ')') AS Metric
FROM
  otel_metrics_sum
WHERE
  MetricName LIKE '%memory%'
GROUP BY
  avg_time, Metric
ORDER BY
  avg_time, Metric
  )


SELECT sum(Avg_MEMORY_Usage) as Total_MEMORY_USage, avg_time FROM TotalCount
Group By avg_time

SELECT
  toStartOfHour(TimeUnix) AS Time,
  concat(MetricName, ' (', ResourceAttributes['service.name'], ')') AS Metric,
  avg(Value) AS Avg_CPU_Usage
 FROM
  otel_metrics_sum
WHERE
  ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND
  MetricName LIKE '%disk%'
GROUP BY
  Time,
  Metric
ORDER BY
  Time,
  Metric;

WITH TotalCount AS (
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(TimeUnix) as avg_time,
  AVG(Value) AS Avg_CPU_Usage,
  concat(MetricName, ' (', ResourceAttributes['service.name'], ')') AS Metric
FROM
  otel_metrics_sum
WHERE
  MetricName LIKE '%disk%'
GROUP BY
  avg_time, Metric
ORDER BY
  avg_time, Metric
  )


SELECT sum(Avg_CPU_Usage) as Total_CPU_USage, avg_time FROM TotalCount
Group By avg_time

SELECT
ServiceName as id,
ServiceName as title,
AVG(Duration) / 1000 as mainstat, -- 예: 평균 지속 시간(ms)
CONCAT('req cnt ', CAST(count() AS VARCHAR)) as secondarystat,
--  AVG(Duration) / 1000 as detail__RESPONSE_TIME, -- 예: 평균 지속 시간(ms)
--  CAST(count() AS VARCHAR) as detail__REQUEST_COUNT,
CONCAT(CAST(sum((if(StatusCode = 'STATUS_CODE_ERROR', 1, 0)) * 100) / COUNT() AS VARCHAR) , '%') AS detail__ERROR_RATE,


sum(if(StatusCode == 'STATUS_CODE_UNSET', 1, 0)) / COUNT() AS arc__unset_rate,
sum(if(StatusCode == 'STATUS_CODE_OK', 1, 0)) / COUNT() AS arc__ok_rate,
sum(if(StatusCode == 'STATUS_CODE_ERROR', 1, 0)) / COUNT() AS arc__error_rate
-- StatusMessage as secondarystat
FROM otel_traces
WHERE ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb'
GROUP BY ServiceName

SELECT
concat(s.ServiceName, '_', t.ServiceName) as id,
 s.ServiceName as source,
 t.ServiceName as target,
 AVG(t.Duration) / 1000 as detail__RESPONSE_TIME,-- 예: 평균 응답 시간 (ms)
 CAST(count() AS VARCHAR) as detail__REQUEST_COUNT, -- 예: 전체 요청 수
 CONCAT(CAST(sum((if(t.StatusCode = 'ERROR', 1, 0)) * 100) * COUNT() AS VARCHAR) , '%') AS detail__ERROR_RATE
FROM otel_traces s
JOIN otel_traces t ON s.SpanId = t.ParentSpanId AND s.TraceId = t.TraceId
GROUP BY s.ServiceName, t.ServiceName

SELECT min(Timestamp) as timestamp, TraceId as `Trace Id`, argMin(ServiceName, Timestamp) as `Service Name`, sum(Duration)/1000000 as Duration 
from otel_traces WHERE ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb' AND $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}),  $trace_id)  AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) AND ServiceName != 'loadgenerator' AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) GROUP BY TraceId ORDER BY Duration DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT TraceId as traceID, SpanId as spanID, SpanName as operationName, ParentSpanId as parentSpanID, ServiceName as serviceName, Duration/1000000 as duration, Timestamp as startTime, arrayMap(key -> map('key', key, 'value',SpanAttributes[key]), mapKeys(SpanAttributes)) as tags, arrayMap(key -> map('key', key, 'value',ResourceAttributes[key]), mapKeys(ResourceAttributes)) as serviceTags FROM otel_traces WHERE TraceId = '${trace_id}' ORDER BY startTime ASC

SELECT $__timeInterval(Timestamp) as time, ServiceName,
	AVG(Duration) AS ` ` FROM otel_traces WHERE $__conditionalAll(TraceId IN (${trace_id:singlequote}),  $trace_id) AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) AND  ( Timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) AND ServiceName != 'loadgenerator' GROUP BY time, ServiceName ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 100000

WITH
    ServiceDurations AS (
        SELECT
            ServiceName,
            Duration
        FROM
            otel_traces
        WHERE ResourceAttributes['user_id'] = 'wnsrb'
    ),

    ServiceStats AS (
        SELECT
            ServiceName,
            AVG(Duration) AS Avg_Duration
        FROM
            ServiceDurations
        GROUP BY
            ServiceName
    )

SELECT
    s.ServiceName as ServiceName,
    Avg_Duration,
    SQRT(SUM(POW(d.Duration - Avg_Duration, 2)) / COUNT(*)) AS StdDev_Duration
FROM
    ServiceDurations d
JOIN
    ServiceStats s ON d.ServiceName = s.ServiceName
GROUP BY
    s.ServiceName, Avg_Duration
ORDER BY
    s.ServiceName;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT TraceId FROM otel_traces WHERE ParentSpanId = '' LIMIT 100
list.label: Trace Id
list.name: trace_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT TraceId FROM otel_traces WHERE ParentSpanId = '' LIMIT 100
